name: Clawface
description: Clawface is an intense, arcade-styled twin stick shooter where you play as an adorable robot equipped with crazy weapons and a giant claw to fight an endless wave of alien monsters!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 400 MB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 450 MB available space Additional Notes: Choose Low Graphics settings with lower power graphics cards
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 450 MB available space
